H0.text: Cell body is the large structure with a central nucleus that is part of a neuron.

H1.text: Proteins body is the part of the neuron that is a large structure with a central nucleus.

H2.text: Eye body is a large structure with a central nucleus that is part of the neuron.

H3.text: Environmental is the part of the neuron that is a large structure with a central nucleus.

A4.text: The soma is the body of the neuron.

A5.text: As it contains the nucleus, most protein synthesis occurs here.
